snippet.title: 1heart trailer
snippet.description:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=191138215
Hi, you will be surely interested in our original adventure game called 1heart. The idea of making it had start on Global Gaming Jam. It is possible to describe it shortly in four simple sentences: 
1. Pretty, unique, digital painted graphic 
2. High difficulty level 
3. Suprising plot 
4. Gameplay which combines classic 90's adventure games with hiden objects 
 In addition for curious ones: 
over 66 hand-painted locations 
over 120 objects, which you can collect 
over a dozen original cutscenes 
over a dozen difficult puzzles 
additional achivments 
for windows and linux 
2 languages -- english and polish (if greenlight/steam community will be interested, it will be possible to add new translations) 
 Please help us get this out there with a vote on Greenlight!
